reporting-org.narrative: Bundesministerium für wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung (BMZ)
Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ)

title.narrative: Support for South Sudanese Refugees and Host Communities in Uganda
Unterstützung südsudanesischer Flüchtlinge und aufnehmender Gemeinden in Uganda (VP)

description.narrative: Mit dem Vorhaben soll ein Beitrag zur Sicherung der Lebensgrundlagen sowie zur Verbesserung der sozioökonomischen Entwicklungsmöglichkeiten für Flüchtlinge und Bewohner aufnehmender Gemeinden in Uganda geleistet werden. Gleichzeitig soll die friedliche Koexistenz zwischen den Bevölkerungsgruppen gefördert werden. Ziel des Moduls ist, dass der Refugee Response Fund (RRF) beim Projektträger Office of the Prime Minister etabliert ist und über Implementierungspartner bedarfsorientiert Infrastrukturvorhaben finanziert. In zwei Fast-Track-Projekten sollen (1) Maßnahmen im WASH-Bereich in dem Siedlungsgebiet Rhino Camp durch die NRO Oxfam und (2) Maßnahmen im Bildungsbereich in dem Siedlungsgebiet Bidibidi durch die NRO Save the Children durchgeführt werden. Die Gesamtkosten der ersten Phase des Programms belaufen sich auf 10 Mio. EUR.

The Programme concerns the support of the intensive efforts of the Ugandan government to address the needs of the refugees and host communities. For this purpose, a Refugee Response Fund (RRF) is set up to allow for a transparent and efficient selection, financing and monitoring process for projects in the refugee context. The Office of the Prime Minister is responsible for the implementation of the RRF. ŒUnder the RRF, two fast-track projects are implemented targeting both refugees and host communities: Œ1. The first project shall improve the drinking water and sanitation situation in Rhino camp, implemented by Oxfam. Œ2. The second project shall improve the education situation in Bidibidi Settlement, implemented by Save the Children (Oxfam and Save the Children together hereinafter referred to as the "NGOs"). ŒThe purpose of the Programme is that the RRF finances and monitors the fast-track projects and that the created infrastructure is utilized by the population/target group. This is to contribute to securing basic needs as well as to the social and economic development of refugees and people in host communities.

The Programme concerns the support of the intensive efforts of the Ugandan government to address the needs of the refugees and host communities. For this purpose, a Refugee Response Fund (RRF) is set up to allow for a transparent and efficient selection, financing and monitoring process for projects in the refugee context. The Office of the Prime Minister is responsible for the implementation of the RRF. ŒUnder the RRF, two fast-track projects are implemented targeting both refugees and host communities: Œ1. The first project shall improve the drinking water and sanitation situation in Rhino camp, implemented by Oxfam. Œ2. The second project shall improve the education situation in Bidibidi Settlement, implemented by Save the Children (Oxfam and Save the Children together hereinafter referred to as the "NGOs"). ŒThe purpose of the Programme is that the RRF finances and monitors the fast-track projects and that the created infrastructure is utilized by the population/target group. This is to contribute to securing basic needs as well as to the social and economic development of refugees and people in host communities.

Übergeordnetes entwicklungspolitisches Ziel ist es, einen Beitrag zur Sicherung der Lebensgrundlagen sowie zur Verbesserung der sozioökonomischen Entwicklung der Flüchtlinge und der Bewohner aufnehmender Gemeinden in Norduganda zu leisten.

title.narrative: Für dieses Vorhaben liegt kein Eintrag zur Umwelt- und Sozialverträglichkeit vor.
Für dieses Vorhaben liegt kein Projektbudget-Dokument vor.
No project budget document is available for this project.
